metadata.Title: CVE-2018-16402 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description: libelf/elf_end.c in elfutils 0.173 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (double free and application crash) or possibly have unspecified other impact because it tries to decompress twice.

notes.Note: ccdm94> the vulnerable code was introduced with commit 272018bb (0.165).

criterions.comment: elfutils: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
